title: Return the Locket
content: person who started to speak in the first cutscene. Option №3 You try to steal Locker and have not succeeded. The cutscene is interrupted. And you see, just running Meli again, and at that moment, you see the quest in your journal and get +15 XP. Very strange. Only now do you have additional options for dialog with Barth in the quest to get back the Locker cause you didn't defend a boy, and you didn't help to return the Locker in a peaceful way.
